sent_1: I dropped the kids off for the movie at 2PM, so they should be ready for pick-up by 4PM.
sent_2: I dropped the kids off for the movie at 4PM, so they should be ready for pick-up at 2PM.

sent_1: Because I wanted a sweeter banana custard, I waited a day for the bananas to ripen.
sent_2: Because I wanted a sweeter banana custard, I waited a month for the bananas to ripen.

sent_1: If you visit the north of Norway during the summer, you'll be able to see the midnight sun.
sent_2: If you visit the north of Spain during the summer, you'll be able to see the midnight sun.

sent_1: Daniel had a train to catch in an hour so he heated his soup in the microwave rather than fire up the wood burning stove.
sent_2: Daniel had a a train to catch in an hour so he fired up the wood burning stove rather than heat his soup in the microwave.

sent_1: Tim's return from China to the U.S. got delayed due to inclement weather causing cancellation of the plane, he will return to work two days later.
sent_2: Tim's return from China to the U.S. got delayed due to inclement weather causing cancellation of the plane, he will return to work tomorrow.

sent_1: Peter invited his neighbor Jonathan for dinner, Jonathan arrived on time for dinner.
sent_2: Peter invited his neighbor Jonathan for dinner, Jonathan arrived on time for lunch.

sent_1: Peter got injured in a car accident yesterday, so he is not able to go to work yesterday morning.
sent_2: Peter got injured in a car accident yesterday, so he was not able to go to work last Friday.

sent_1: Jacob does not have a test until tomorrow so he can study for it today.
sent_2: Jacob does not have a test until tomorrow so he can not study for it today.

sent_1: Because Phil received $30 per hour for working over time, he worked 3 overtime hours so he could buy himself a $70 dollar shirt.
sent_2: Because Phil received $30 per hour for working over time, he worked 1 overtime hour so he could buy himself a $70 dollar shirt.

sent_1: Laura got her paper accepted for publication in March. She decided to start final revision on the paper February of the year.
sent_2: Laura got her paper accepted for publication in January. She decided to start final revision on the paper February of the year.

sent_1: It's 2 pm and the movie is at 4 pm, so I have time to go buy snacks.
sent_2: It's 2 pm and the movie is at 2 pm, so I have time to go buy snacks.

sent_1: If I want to keep a houseplant healthy, I should place it by a window that gets six hours of sunlight a day.
sent_2: If I want to keep a houseplant healthy, I should place it by a window that gets sixty minutes of sunlight a day.

sent_1: Because the drive was 20 miles long, Beth was able to make it to her destination in under 5 minutes.
sent_2: Because the drive was 20 miles long, Beth was able to make it to her destination in under 5 hours.

sent_1: Amy went outside during November so she decided to wear multiple layers.
sent_2: Amy went outside during May so she decided to wear multiple layers.

sent_1: Jon needed to heat his frozen food so he put it in the microwave for 2 minutes.
sent_2: Jon needed to heat his frozen food so he put it in the microwave for 10 minutes.

sent_1: My school bus arrives in 1 minute, I do not have time to walk home 5 minutes for my umbrella.
sent_2: My school bus arrives in 15 minutes, I do not have time to walk home 5 minutes for my umbrella.

sent_1: Jan wanted some time off his job to attend lunch with his girlfriend, so he asked his manager for a break at 12 PM instead of 12 AM.
sent_2: Jan wanted some time off his job to attend lunch with his girlfriend, so he asked his manager for a break at 12 AM instead of 12 PM.

sent_1: Hoping to have a heart to heart with her friend over lunch, Lisa asked her to take a long lunch break instead of a short one.
sent_2: Hoping to have a heart to heart with her friend over lunch, Lisa asked her to take a short lunch break instead of a long one.

sent_1: A person will not starve to death if they go one day without eating any food.
sent_2: A person will starve to death if they go one day without eating any food.

sent_1: Paula's school is within a ten minute walk. So she decided to ride a bike.
sent_2: Paula's school is within a ten minute walk. So she decided to get on a plane.

sent_1: Someone who has 1000$ in the bank and gets 4% interest per year, will have more than 1030$ at the end of the first year
sent_2: Someone who has 1000$ in the bank and gets 3% interest per year, will have more than 1030$ at the end of the first year

sent_1: If you want to get Halloween candy on sale you should go one day after Halloween.
sent_2: If you want to get Halloween candy on sale you should go one year after Halloween.

sent_1: The storm is supposed to hit in 50 minutes and I love running in the rain so I'll go on a run in 50 minutes.
sent_2: The storm is supposed to hit in 50 minutes and I love running in the rain so I'll go on a run in 5 minutes.

sent_1: If a person in the Europe is having dinner around 8 pm GMT, most people in Australia are asleep
sent_2: If a person on the west coast of USA is having dinner around 8 pm, most people in Australia are asleep

sent_1: In the winter time in Canada, I love playing pond hockey.
sent_2: In the summer time in Canada, I love playing pond hockey.

sent_1: If you want to make a good batch of popcorn, you should microwave it until there is one second between pops.
sent_2: If you want to make a good batch of popcorn, you should microwave it until there is one minute between pops.

sent_1: For ice skaters training for the Olympics, an hour a day of training is not enough, but six hours a day might be.
sent_2: For ice skaters training for the Olympics, an hour a day of training is enough, and six hours a day is excessive.

sent_1: If you're driving right behind someone who suddenly brakes, you might only have a minute or two to react before crashing!
sent_2: If you're driving right behind someone who suddenly brakes, you might only have a second or two react before crashing!

sent_1: Since my last exam is today, I booked a flight home from school that departs tomorrow.
sent_2: Since my last exam is today, I booked a flight home from school that departed yesterday.

sent_1: Frida wanted to avoid crowds at the beach, so she went there at  12 am.
sent_2: Frida wanted to avoid crowds at the beach, so she went there at 12 pm.

sent_1: If you go to the grocery store and buy flour with the intention of turning it into a cake, you will have to wait about 180 minutes for it to be ready.
sent_2: If you go to the grocery store and buy flour with the intention of turning it into a cake, you will have to wait about 18 minutes for it to be ready.

sent_1: Since my doctor's appointment is at noon and it takes twenty minutes to get there, I should leave by 11:45 am.
sent_2: Since my doctor's appointment is at noon and it takes ten minutes to get there, I should leave by 11:45 am.

sent_1: Since I don't have to work on Saturday, I can plan to go out of town for the day.
sent_2: Since I have to work on Saturday, I can't plan to go out of town for the day.

sent_1: Hayden was 17 years old, so he knew it was time to start looking into what colleges he is interested in.
sent_2: Hayden was 17 months old, so he knew it was time to start looking into what colleges he is interested in.

sent_1: The criminal had only nine minutes to get away after the alarm was sounded, so he made sure the get-away car was just across the street
sent_2: The criminal had only nine minutes to get away after the alarm was sounded, so he made sure the get-away car was far from the scene.

sent_1: If you feel a cramp in your legs, you should stretch your legs to relieve some of the tension.
sent_2: If you feel a cramp in your legs, you should bend your legs to relieve some of the tension.

sent_1: Today is January 21, and Valentine's Day is on February 14, so I have plenty of time to search for and land a date for the day of lovers.
sent_2: Today is January 21, and Valentine's Day is on February 14, so I don't have enough time to search for and land a date for the day of lovers.

sent_1: The movie does not start for 3 hours so Tate has time to eat dinner first.
sent_2: The movie does not start for 3 hours so Tate does not have time to eat dinner first.

sent_1: Laura has been trying to memorize a Beethoven Piano Sonata. It took her five weeks.
sent_2: Laura has been trying to memorize a Beethoven Piano Sonata. It took her one hour.

sent_1: Since he'd be driving in the middle of the day, John was sure to take his sunglasses.
sent_2: Since he'd be driving in the middle of the night, John was sure to take his sunglasses.
